programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - Duggee is having a lovely cup of tea in his favourite cup when Roly surprises him with a very loud peek-a-boo! It is so loud that Duggee jumps and drops his cup which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Tarbela Dam, Pakistan - When Grandmaster Glitch gets his hands on a G.O. Force, the forecast isn't good for the Tarbela Dam in Pakistan.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep34
programme.desc: The Parthenon, Greece - Inspired by his favourite action film, Grand Master Glitch plans to make a blockbuster of his own, but first he needs to find the right setting for an action adventure.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep10
programme.desc: Victor Says Yes - Victor agrees to fix almost every engine in Sodor on the same day; he learns that it is okay to say no sometimes.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: Wool on Wheels - Scarf Lady is holding a 'knitted treats' sale in the park, but the weather is causing a problem...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: Music Fixer - Sarah's Tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Lost in Fog - It's very foggy in the Camping Park, the girls use sound to find their way around.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Dog Loves Art - Pug wants to learn how to paint. Our heroes visit Picasso's studio in Paris.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Hello Goodbye - Monty wonders if it is possible to feel both happy and sad at the same time.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Things That Went Somewhere - Bob, Gwen and Tony want to get into a shady place to escape the hot sun.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep74
programme.desc: Trees A Crowd - Three hard-working, young, professional Po love living together in a big house with a beautiful tree... but they keep blocking each other into a shared driveway!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep75
programme.desc: Band Together - Mayor Sho-Po is planning a parade but threatens to call it off when the Blockers can't play and march together at the same time!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep18
programme.desc: Piggyback - The Heelers take a long riverside walk, but Bingo's legs are tired, and she wants a piggyback. To distract her, mum and dad invent fun games and get her little legs moving again.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey. Time for the bees to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - Duggee has made a beautiful rock pool. The Squirrels spot the strangest things - dots with tails, wriggling around. What on earth are they? They are baby frogs - tadpoles!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the squirrels want to play outside. What can they do? Duggee knows - he's flying his kite. The Squirrels set about making their own kites to fly.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep33
programme.desc: Easter Island, Chile - Grandmaster Glitch is on holiday to the remote Easter Island to avoid crowds, but when he arrives he finds droves of tourists everywhere!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: The Grand Canyon, USA - Kyan is completing his 'GoJet Academy' high-wire training, above the Grand Canyon, but he's not the only wire-walker out there...

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Don't Forget To Remember - Flinders ties five ribbons on his tail to remind him of five things he needs to do.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Sliding Down - The Tubby Car takes the Teletubbies to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Slidey. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po have great fun sliding down again and again.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: Plane - Dee encourages a friend to say 'plane' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore a flying plane, a landing plane, a fast plane and even meeting a sneezing plane!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep75
programme.desc: Band Together - Mayor Sho-Po is planning a parade but threatens to call it off when the Blockers can't play and march together at the same time!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Open a Café - After visiting the park café, JoJo and Gran Gran decide to make their own play café in Gran Gran's garden. JoJo learns that running your own café is really fun.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: Daydreamer Monty - Monty is dreaming up fantastical ways to get the new piano upstairs, but his family tell him that daydreaming won't help solve real problems.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep30
programme.desc: The Queen - Monty wonders whether the Queen has perfect manners all the time, or whether even royalty slip up now and then.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the squirrels don't quite understand.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - Duggee wants to try out his new pizza oven, so while he makes the bases the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You can't play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Mount Rushmore, USA - When the Grimbots add Glitch's face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: Seesaw - Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Nitwit Neighborhood News / The Patrick Show MidSeason Finale - Patrick and Squidina report the news around Bikini Bottom. // The Patrick Show presents the epic conclusion to the first half of its first season.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep107
programme.desc: No Bones About It / Childish Antics - The mount has become a construction zone! Sammy and Raj need to find a way to fix this... // Sammy has his sights set on an Action Figure but it's 100 bucks! Luckily Malini has just the job for them...

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Snow Way to Win / Causing Treble - It's a snow day! Sammy and Raj are ready to race their sleighs but when they get to the mount, Tara has already set up camp.// Sammy, Raj and Dadi are a musical sensation! But after entering a local talent on show, Raj becomes really nervous.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Simon Says - When Alvin accuses Simon of being too safe, Simon agrees to do whatever crazy thing Alvin wants him to do.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep406
programme.desc: World Record - The Chipmunks and Chipettes compete to set a world record in hopes of winning a new virtual reality game.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pirates Life - When pirates show up at the house, the boys do all they can to protect a treasure chest that arrived for Dave.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep146
programme.desc: The Abrasive Side / Earworm - SpongeBob can never say "no" to anyone, so he orders a product called the "abrasive side". // SpongeBob gets a song stuck in his head.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick - SpongeBob can't drive, but you don't need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Mexican Makeover / Uptown Funk - Adelaide and Carl have an adventure on Mr. Chang's route, but can they work together to save the day? // When Mama Lupe comes to visit, Abuela tries to get her family at the top of their cultural game.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady - When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Picture Perfect / Undie Pressure - Lincoln plots to take the 'perfect' family photo for his parents' anniversary gift. // Lincoln and his sisters bet on who can go the longest without doing their most annoying habits.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Linc or Swim / Changing the Baby - Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it. // After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep26
programme.desc: Grandma's Kisses / Squidville - SpongeBob's friends tease him after Grammaw gives him a kiss. // Sick and tired of living between Spongebob and Patrick, Squidward decides to move out of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep186
programme.desc: Safe Deposit Krabs / Plankton's Pet - Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom’s brand-new bank, and it’s up to SpongeBob & Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep53
programme.desc: New Student Starfish / Clams - Patrick joins Ms. Puff's class but begins to get Spongebob in a lot of trouble causing him to lose gold stars. // Mr. Krabs takes Spongebob and Squidward on a clam fishing trip.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep54
programme.desc: Spongebob B.C. (Before Comedy) - It is prehistoric Bikini Bottom, and we spend a day in the life of SpongeGar, Patar, and Squog. (Spongebob, Patrick, and Squidward's prehistoric alter-egos.)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep62
programme.desc: The Lost Mattress / Krabs vs Plankton - Spongebob buys Mr. Krabs a new mattress to help him sleep better. // Plankton slips and falls on some water at the Krusty Krab and sues Mr. Krabs for not posting a wet floor sign.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep56
programme.desc: Born Again Krabs / I Had an Accident - Mr. Krabs gets ill after eating an old Krabby Patty that he refused to throw away. // SpongeBob has an accident while sand sledding! Afraid for his safety, he won't leave his house.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep103
programme.desc: POSTBOT 3000 / Boom Goes the Cloud - Angus agrees to compete against Mayor Peeve's new POSTBOT in a 'mail-off' to save the Middlemost Post. // Parker's anxiety escalates when the cloud appears to be the source of loud nightly thundering plaguing the town.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep113
programme.desc: A. Plumber - After clogging the toilet, Parker calls a plumber-that winds up being Ryan in disguise-to fix the problem.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Shifu's Back - When Shifu throws out his back, Po has to sit in as master of the Jade Palace.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Southern Air Temple - Aang is eager to take Sokka and Katara to the Air Temple where he was raised. But upon arrival, it becomes apparent that the temple is not at all how Aang remembers it.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: High Moltage - The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action star's blockbuster movie!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Diner Ducks / Switcheroo - After wracking up a huge bill at Pumpers, SwaySway and Buhdeuce level up into Diner Ducks to pay off their debt. // Things get awkward when the guys eat a loaf of Switcheroo Bread and swap bodies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep107
programme.desc: When Dragons Cry - To get the dragon's tears needed for Axe, the group must first visit a magical marketplace, where Stacey's meeting with a witch finally reveals Brendar's complicated backstory.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Chosen One... Stinks / Not Another Superhero Movie - Ollie's stinky sweat is a hot commodity in the Monsterverse, and makes a deal in exchange for it. // Ollie, Cleo and Bernie need to make an epic superhero movie to save Portshill High's Film Club.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep103
programme.desc: War and Pizza / Newsworthy - The Turtles help April throw a not-so-happy birthday party. // This just in: anchor man turned mutant-worm used to report the news, now he's making headlines.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Heightmare / Be Like Tufflips - Sanjay is finally big enough to go on the scariest carnival ride, but can he survive it? // Sanjay dresses like Remington Tufflips and is mistaken for his hero.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Dorg's New Mom / Dorg Hates Olives - The gang need an adult escort to see the new Johnny Fist movie, so Yooki possesses Dorg's mom. // Dorg needs the Magicals' help to stomach his mom's icky Olive Surprise recipe. programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Clarence Slockee visits an herbalist's home garden, Costa Georgiadis drops by the home of former GA presenter Mary Moody, Jane Edmanson discovers the art of hedging and Tino Carnevale visits a garden designed for wildlife.

programme.title: Eat Smart Campaign Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We recap the journey so far and take you on a whirlwind tour of Papua New Guinea, from the coast to the islands to the cities.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep10
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep10
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep48
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep68
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: The Drum Ep53
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep51

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event

programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Located 30km north-east of Florence in the beautiful countryside of Tuscany, Mugello is a modern circuit with excellent facilities. Bought by Ferrari back in 1988, the 5.245km track has been renovated to a high standard and has a growing reputation as one of the world’s most up-to-date, scenic and safest race circuits. A blend of slow and fast turns with sweeping curves, long straights and off-camber corners make Mugello one of the most challenging circuits for the riders and engineers. Having hosted its first MotoGP event back in 1976 the venue became a permanent fixture in 1991 after extensive refurbishment. Set within a beautiful tree lined Tuscan valley, Mugello also offers ample viewing areas for a particularly boisterous and partisan Italian crowd.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2303
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022

programme.title: Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - In 1989, through the joint collaboration of the Catalan Autonomous Government, the Montmeló Town Council and the Royal Automobile Club of Catalunya (RACC), work began on giving one of Europe’s most beautiful cities a state of the art race track to match. The Circuit de Catalunya opened on the doorstep of Barcelona in September 1991 and welcomed its first international event that same month, hosting the Spanish F1 Grand Prix. It went on to host the European Motorcycle Grand Prix and in 1995 became home to the Gran Premio de Catalunya. Considered to be one of the best designed circuits of the recent era, the Circuito de Catalunya won the much coveted IRTA ‘Best Grand Prix’ trophy for 2001 and has a general admission capacity of 104,000 spectators.
